data.title: Polkadot Founder Gavin Wood Snubs Vitalik Buterin’s Ethereum White Paper
data.description: https://x.com/Polkadot/status/1993593944824070610 Gavin Wood helped Vitalik Buterin realize his vision for Ethereum. Wood said the original Ethereum White Paper was more of a vision than a ...
data.keywords: Gavin Wood, Vitalik Buterin, technical specification document, vision document, Ethereum
